story.narrative: In order to be able to buy in blibli As a customer I want to be able to login
story.name: BlibliLogin.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Go to blibli site and login Given open home page When I login to Blibli Then I can see muy name in the site
Scenario:Search Given search items When I found my items Then I add to cart
Scenario:Add to payment Given next to checkout When I choose and fill payment option Then I submit my orders
